job.title: Software Engineer, Apple Pay
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brImagine what you could do here At Apple new ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly You bring passion and dedication to your job and theres no telling what you could accomplish   brbrbrWe provide the machine learning infrastructure data products and algorithms supporting some of Apples newest and fastest growing services Going beyond accuracy we are driven to develop fair explainable algorithms that preserve user privacy Machine Learning solutions at Apple require rigorous data engineering we always launch at scalebrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br3 years proficient experience programming in an enterprise language CC Java Go etcbrbr3 years experience in another language suited to machine learning R Python Scala etcbrbr3 years experience with big data environments and tools Hadoop Spark Jupyter Notebook etcbrbr2 years experience crafting and implementing data product pipelines at scalebrbr2 years experience with a variety of machine learning  deep learning libraries TensorFlow Scikitlearn etc and data visualization libraries MatPlotLib D3js etcbrbrWorking knowledge of governancesecurity concepts and technologies including encryption anonymization PCI PII HIPAA etcbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brWe are looking for candidates with broad experience from system integration developing data pipelines and data governance through to model training deployment and monitoring in production We are especially interested in proven ability to solve problems continuous learning and digging deep into the domain when necessary We want to collaborate with team members that have a balance of theory and practice  brbrbrJob duties include the following  brbrbrMultifunctional collaboration during data discovery review of data specifications and identification of data with potential to improve machine learning services   brbrScoping design and implementation of reliable system integrations for data acquisition   brbrData cleaning feature development and data product governance   brbrFull lifecycle analytic model ownership including model selection training evaluation deployment and maintenancebrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBS or MS in Computer Science or related technical field equivalent work experience will be consideredbrbr brRole Number 200289743brbr
